messages.message:
*Feature improvement request:* 

*Allow additional file/folder uploads to AI Hub when running apps/deployments:*
• The screenshot attached shows what happens when I drag and drop (or otherwise upload) files to the picker modal, in this case, prior to running a deployment manually.
• It would be nice to be able to add additional files prior running the deployment so that I don't have to to hit cancel, relocate my files (rearranging all target files in a shared location, even), and re-uploading.
